channel.title: R on nikhil agarwal
channel.description: Recent content in R on nikhil agarwal

item.title: Shiny Modules and the Bright Appeal
item.description: For a while now, I’ve been hearing quite a bit about Shiny Modules. In fact, an intriguing package - {golem} - makes strong use of Shiny Modules. The concept of Shiny Modules is not necessarily new; it’s been around for over a year! I never dove into Shiny Modules because when I first started learning more about it, I couldn’t’ wrap my head around a few things: the purpose the need the advantages And to be fair, the answers to all three are well documented (see here and here).
